name: Tactical Z (battle royale)
description:
WASD/Arrows - Move

Mouse - Look Around

Click/Space - Shoot, Use Item, Eat

E - Pick up, Interact

Q - Drop

F - Build

1,2,3,4,5,6 - Switch Item

Z - Emotes (Online)

B - Get Unstuck from a wall!

L - Leave Modes

Battle Royale is a 25-player offline (bots) face-off, dropping from the Tac-Z onto the main island, gather items, fight with them, and try to be the last man standing before the purple storm closes in.

- Exploration sends you into the same main island, but there are no other players and no storm. You're free to experiment and do whatever you want in this mode.

- Online Playground is a Cloud Multiplayer where you can mess around with other players using a selection of items that are independent between players. The skins and gliders you equip will be shown online.
